remark.p: Foreign Service Officer. Director of Policy Planning; Assistant Secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs; Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (China).
member of the National Security Council Staff, 1969-1970; thereafter staff member Office of the Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs
